entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:41 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 12:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -15.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -18.1°C
Wind: N 23 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:55 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:55 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:55 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
